website_summaries.verdict: Whimsical look for a simple bed frame, and easy to move from point A to B.
pros: This all-metal frame surprises customers with its sleep-inducing comfort
In addition, it further surprises customers with its versatility as it can be separated into 2 twin frames
Adaptable as well, and can provide a sound night of sleep in unexpected situations
cons: We would prefer more thorough instructions for assembly

customer_reviews.title: Oterwise great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Squeaks a tiny bit when under... heavy turbulence. Oterwise great and sturdy. Perfect height. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Papineau

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts... Could Have Been 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been five stars (quality, construction, ease, etc.) except that it came without two of the bolts needed, and they are custom constructed (fused, and an odd size) that you can't find in a hardware store. Made in China... missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: blisschick

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdiness, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdiness, easy to put together. Only thing is I ordered green one boys picked favorite colors but it came in gray. Other then that got both beds up in less then 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rosalynn perkins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: Classic camp style bed in a great color. Easy to set up. I bought the queen sized bed to go on our tiny house. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the queen bed frame is actually 2 twins that can be bolded together. I skipped bolting them to have the option of using them as twin beds if the need arrises.
customer_reviews.author: C Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few days of use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our guests room and we ass embled it easily. However after being put together for a little over a week (we had company coming for Thanksgiving weekend and while in use) the middle portion of the frame collapsed. Upon inspection we found the middle legs of the frame had snapped from where they were connected to the larger portion of the frame. I have already gotten rid of the box as it looked good when we first set it up. It's clearly not a quality item and we we're very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius Karaski

customer_reviews.title: Not worth to invest money in this worthless bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with quality of this bed frame available on Amazon. Amazon should refund my money and take this crap item back Unfortunately i can't return it since return window of 1 month is closed.My Bed frame usage was normal and it broke in 2 months .I wouldn't recommend it for Adults .
customer_reviews.author: NNN

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed frame! Very affordable! Easy to assemble! Honestly, I didn't know what to expect from an all-metal frame, but I find it very comfortable, I do not feel it at all on the memory foam mattress that sits atop the frame. Promptly delivered. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kipp

customer_reviews.title: came with no instructions or foot caps and it is NOT 'plug and play'
customer_reviews.text: this thing came missing the foot caps, no instructions - and tho it says 'no tools required' it comes with a little wrench and screws - and not a damn word what to do with them. it's together, it's not rocket science, but that isn't the point. It needs instructions for the cross bars and connecting the two pieces together and it needs the damn foot caps - I have hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great value ! Doesn’t make noise and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my full size tempurpedic . I use it without a boxspring or board - just the mattress on the frame . It’s way higher than I was expecting but I guess my bad for not measuring. At first I thought it was too high but now I like it ! It’s very stable and doesn’t move at all or make any noise ! It also folds up easily . Very happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: flexiest

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction and scratches hardwood
customer_reviews.text: Not good for hardwood floors as it moves around so much and scratches the floors really badly. The welding is shoddy and broke after a few months of normal wear with a memory foam mattress. The T shaped weld on the bed legs completely broke on the center legs causing the whole bed including the metal “slats” to cave in and scraped my hardwood and ripped my mattress. Probably fine for a carpeted bedroom but not good for regular use on smooth floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Try it you will like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice economical bed frame. You don't need a box spring. It can take less then 20 minutes to put together and less then that if you. keep them separate. I have weak knees and this bed with the mattress on top is easy for me to get on and off. I have laminated floor and the bed does not move, but is lightweight enought be move if needed. There is plenty of storage under it. I placed a bed skirt between the frame and mattress to hide the storage areas.
customer_reviews.author: wise chick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first then my 40lb 5 year old jumped on it and the welding came apart . Owned less then 3 months
customer_reviews.author: R Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy For Eight Year Old
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal for a child's twin bed. They can pull it away from the wall when making their bed in the morning. For an adult that weighs over two hundred pounds, I would not recommend their weight on this bed frame. Teens and young kids, yes. We use one mattress with this too-no box. Miss Jones Bay City MI
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jones Bay City MI

customer_reviews.title: Good product, needs better instructions 😊
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the cost but the instructions could have been a little more clear. I read several reviews of the frame bending/breaking when weight was put on it but when I was assembling it I noticed ALL the bolts on the product needed to be tightened (not just the ones they point out in the instructions). I wonder if that miscommunication could have contributed the others issues with the frame. Once I tightened everything the frame was really solid and sturdy. It is a decent replacement for a standard frame and box spring as it is study and gives the height of a standard set up. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Cookson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bedframe
customer_reviews.text: We were very satisfied with the delivery and quality of the Modway frame. The comfort of the frame allowed us to eliminate the need for a box spring. We have a close relative who has a mental challenge, but is able to live on his own in a apartment housing unit. Unfortunately, the housing unit is repeatedly beset by bedbugs. We have spent a fortune on bedbug covers and pesticides to keep his room from being infested. He refuses to move, so we do our best to keep him clean and comfortable. The Modway frame is an excellent value compared to buying quality bedbug covers.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest bed in the world
customer_reviews.text: Missing a few nuts, but nothing I couldn't find & replace myself. Not the greatest bed in the world, but does the job. Can't really complain other than it's little squeaky, and kinda of slides around a lot. I'll definitely be saving up for a nicer, more expensive frame at some point, but this works in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Kaiaaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very sturdy doesn't leave room for your mattress to sag. Only thing is it does start to creak and clink after some time. Noticed this after a few weeks. Not sure if tightening bolts will help or not, but it's not very loud or consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but hardware was not included
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this frame for ~2 weeks now and so far have not had any issues. I will say that the hardware it’s supposed to come with was not in my box but rather than go through the hassle of trying to get it I just went to the hardware store and for ~$2 I had I everything I needed. I can’t say how well it will hold up in the long run but I ended up just getting heavy duty zip ties to adjoin the two sides of the frame and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple frame that holds up well. The twin mattress doesn't slide around, & there's room for storage beneath. I needed a frame that would fit a slightly smaller space, & this fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: NM Mama

customer_reviews.title: You wil need to purchase the foot covers (used for ...
customer_reviews.text: You wil need to purchase the foot covers (used for step stools or ladders) so the middle legs don’t bend or scratch wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Julie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Need to check weight
customer_reviews.text: I at first thought it was good. I first got it for my grandson, but he refused it. His mother wanted it. I didn't double check weight. My daughter was over weight so it broke! Mostly it was my fault.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: It seems a bit flimsy, it's not of good quality. I wouldn't buy another one. I sure hope it does not squeak when the bed is on it. Spend the extra few dollars and get this one. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Crossbars started popping off before we even put the mattress on the frame! Within a few months the side support legs were all bent causing the mattress to sag. This bed is for my teen daughter, I could only imagine if a couple tried to use the frame. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.  Holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 120lb 15 yo. It was very easy to assemble and he’s been using it for 7 months with no issues. Not sure how sturdy it would be for heavier weights for any significant amount of time. The little pop of color in his room is nice. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: doublepopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazon had everything I needed to create a comfortable bed to be setup in the back of a ...
customer_reviews.text: As I planned for a cross country Family Reunion Trip, Amazon had everything I needed to create a comfortable bed to be setup in the back of a horse trailer. Using this easy to assemble queen bed frame, a folding 4" king mattress and 4" Gel Foam Mattress Topper, we felt like we were sleeping at home each night.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  A keeper.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for mattresses in our enclosed cargo trailer. We needed frames that would fold during transport, were easy to set up and have a durable frame. They exceeded our expectations. Very sturdy (holds 300 lbs no problem). Extremely comfortable with our mattresses. I'm not sure how they would hold up in a daily basis but we only need them for an annual trip for 5 days at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: VERY FRAGILE!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLY FRAGILE!!! Was attracted to the design and price point, but within 8 months most of the support wires and one of the larger support beams busted (while just sitting in bed). Frame creaks, breaks easily/frequently, and bends/warps easily. Would NOT recommend! If I could get my money back this much later, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered green and this bed is great. It can actually support two adults comfortably and its very easy to move. My right arm is immobilized and I can easily move this bed around and make the bed with one hand, which is a huge plus for me. Bed seemed easy to put together (my roommates did it) and it came with easy to follow instructions. Overall I love this bed for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Elaijah

customer_reviews.title: These were no match for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these frames. In less than 6 months, 3 were broken and had to be thrown out. Doesn't do well with several children sitting on it at once, or children jumping on it. If you are doing anything active while in the bed, this frame isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: LaTosha McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect frame.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Good height and support for mattress only. Is actually 2 Cot size frames that can be bolted together. Tip: Price and availability varies by frame color.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a little sturdier. But is nice.
customer_reviews.author: vicky keane

customer_reviews.title: Easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: The welding has already snapped. This is my daughters bed and she weighs maybe( big maybe) 30lbs. There should be no reason it’s already breaking
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: The green is anazing and I like it better than the bedframe I paid 700 for...the coolest part is it pulls apart to make two twin beds if I ever need that :)
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: I love this frame
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame! It is super easy to put together and the mattress sits high enough off the floor that you have loads of storage under it. The color is VERY green, but since it's covered with a bedskirt, that's ok. Definitely give this 5 stars based on timely delivery, ease of assembly, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Audra M.

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and easy to set up. It came missing a bold but I had one in my garage so it was an easy fix. Also was very dusty like it had been in a garage a long time. I just took cleaner and a paper towel and it cleaned right up! I would recommend this item for sure! I put a 10 in mattress on top and it does fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't squeak!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for my sons bed. Very happy with my purchase! Assembly was simple, nice and sturdy, doesn't squeak, lots of storage (even with the support bars).
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Set up was really easy. The supporting legs in the middle won't stay upright, though. No amount of adjustment seems to make a difference. If you don't mind kicking it every night before bed, then this is the frame for you.
customer_reviews.author: CouchPotato

customer_reviews.title: Well enough product
customer_reviews.text: Color much more varied from photo. But it's a cheap frame that fit it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Janine R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty easy to put together, some of the hardware was stripped though making it very hard to tighten those certain parts, but not impossible. I purchased blue and it’s true to color 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it is more steady than expected. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cassani

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE to assemble, VERY sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together it was ridiculous!! It’s exactly as pictured and is being used as a daybed at my house. It’s absolutely perfect for the small space I’m working with
customer_reviews.author: KC in WA

customer_reviews.title: Very easy. Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to assemble. You cannot screw this up. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Patty C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed frame. I am quite happy with it. I was confused how to attach the 2 pieces of metal undet each end of the frame. There should be instructions and a video of someone assembling each of the frames modway carries. I looked everywhere online.. and nothing. It was simple once I saw an assembling os a similar frame!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a different frame. Very sturdy and solid. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The frame came mostly pre-assembled and was really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame to use as a spare daybed with a foam mattress on top, ended up sleeping on it for 2 weeks. The frame came mostly pre-assembled and was really easy to put together. The instructions recommended two people and it will take a 1/2 hour to do. I put it together by myself and it only took me about 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was a shipping problem or a manufacturing problem but on of the supporting beams came broken on one side. Since assembling it hasn’t become an issue yet, but definitely disappointing to see. Also the middle legs keep tilting to the side no matter how much I tighten straighten them or tighten the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: L.Brwn

customer_reviews.title: I AM SO HAPPY WITH THIS FRAME YOU CAN PUT IT TOGETHER OR ...
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO HAPPY WITH THIS FRAME YOU CAN PUT IT TOGETHER OR SEPARATE THEM AND STORE AWAY WHEN YOU DECIDE NOT TO USE THIS ITEM I USE THIS ALL THE TIME
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together and came very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest one I could find and I'm very happy with it. Easy to put together, directions were simple, etc. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent and sturdy product. As expected, it has been perfect as a replacement for a bunk bed in that you don't have to purchase box springs. We have a standard twin mattress for our son, and it fits perfectly on this. There is good storage underneath if needed.
customer_reviews.author: OutoftheBlue

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together, it works fine with a Select Comfort air mattress on it. However, it doesn't fold in half without removing some hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! Stores easily umder our queen sized bed. Love that it can be used as a single or queen.
customer_reviews.author: AMcCabe

customer_reviews.title: Green queen bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install came with the tools you need to install. I gave it a 4 starts because my had a few bolts that were rusted but I fix that with a wire brush so I was able to put on the nuts. Does not squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: The frame was easy for me to put together by myself but one ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame was easy for me to put together by myself but one of the metal pieces was bent the wrong way. I was able to bend it back myself but should not have had to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is perfect for people with odd shaped stairwells and other obstacles that make it difficult to use a box spring. It comes folded making it easy to move around. Set up is a breeze. This price here for a queen is about $50 cheaper than retail stores. Plenty of storage underneath the bed frame. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Went together easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy peasy!! No squeaks even! The stg space below is effected by the diagonal bracing but I am get all my suitcases stored under there so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. I bought a frame from this company for my queen sized bed! It's been about a year and it still works great! I'm excited to see how this works out for the kids,
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Make sure you tighten the screws every once in a while as they do get loose over time. Overall very sturdy and a great buy for the twin size.
customer_reviews.author: Shadiyah Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a couple days and it is so cute! I love the color and it was super easy to assemble!!! Ps. My son has asked me to request for an orange metal frame to be added to the options :D
customer_reviews.author: Victorialemieux

customer_reviews.title: Not good instructions bad
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day claim it holds 1500 lbs did not hold 200
customer_reviews.author: Robbyn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this it will hold a lot of weight its ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this it will hold a lot of weight its secure. THE LOVE IT. Need a good thick mattress so you don't feel the springs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great color and very sturdy, my only thing that I don’t like about it is that it’s lower clearance under than I’d like so you can’t fit big boxes under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nyomi

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A few of the small metal rods broke shortly after use.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyQuinn88

customer_reviews.title: Good frame but Missing hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Went up well easy install but was missing wing nuts to put together
customer_reviews.author: Grob

customer_reviews.title: Bad bedframe
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as it claims and feels cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not super happy, but the product itself is ok
customer_reviews.text: Ordered green, received an ugly brown color): 3 pieces were missing, but I was able to get them at Lowe's. Not super happy, but the product itself is ok.
customer_reviews.author: jessie H

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: Love this bedframe! Stylish and practical, we can put storage bins underneath it... Great space for you storage. It will be easy to fold up and move later.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: works great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: its a little wobbly, and im worried it will fall, but it hasent yet, more stable then i expected, i got this becuase it folds up and its light weight so it suites my needs quite well! happy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Martin

customer_reviews.title: Broke on my second night using it
customer_reviews.text: The legs snapped on the mt second night using. I then realized the frame had been welded incorrectly and therefore I could not bolt every part. I tried to fix with zip ties and had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Spencerh

customer_reviews.title: Put it together myself pretty quickly and easily
customer_reviews.text: Saved me when I needed a bed frame though not sure how long it will last. Put it together myself pretty quickly and easily. Emergency gift from family member.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Not at all stable., using for 3months, it sounds really weird and is very weak. I doubt if a 200pound person sits, it might break.
customer_reviews.author: Raghavi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy setup and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Thank Goodness after reading the Review s I got my Pink Color Bed Frame. Very easy setup and very sturdy, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: like rocket science complicated and one of the bars removed
customer_reviews.text: Fixing this was so complicated really; like rocket science complicated and one of the bars removed. It's a decent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: It matches the picture perfectly and sits high off the ground. My son loves his new frame.
customer_reviews.author: CLLEE

customer_reviews.title: Great for guests
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a guestroom. I love that it folds up neatly. Also love the bright blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put together and are solid when using my new bed on them.
customer_reviews.author: Johkal

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: 20 year old college student here assembled all by herself, super amazing super cute, highly recommend, I love my new room. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie De La Melena

customer_reviews.title: Broken box spring during installation
customer_reviews.text: It broke during assembly with very little pressure on metal grating that replaces box spring. It did support mattress and occupants for several days. Not sure how much longer it will last.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Product. Great for a child. I wouldn't recommend someone over 150 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: patricia perry

customer_reviews.title: Great platform
customer_reviews.text: Perfect platform for a bed. Super sturdy. Was expecting a little more clearance underneath but it’s a good height for a bed. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Zackary

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: When we received the package it was missing the Allen key and a lock nut. It would have been a lot easier to assemble if we weren’t running back and forth to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for storing bins of toys and books under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: YaMomnDem

customer_reviews.title: Turned out better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been worth every Penny paid! Sturdy and stronger than I really thought. Great selection of colors, and for a guest room it's perfect. I plan to get another in red for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using since Saturday night, but so far no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: ShonFletch

customer_reviews.title: Decent and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together and it works well I gave it a three because it the middle where the two parts meet it doesn’t feel the same level
customer_reviews.author: Claire Dotoi

customer_reviews.title: Already broke
customer_reviews.text: one of the middle legs that looks to be welded on snapped after a few uses so I'll have to throw the frame out. A waste of $100.
customer_reviews.author: cara denison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble - Easy rest
customer_reviews.text: Very quick assembly. Less than 10 minutes out of the box. Very sturdy and lightweight if you need to move it around a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the grandchildren in twin size, as an added bonus: plenty of room underneath for underbed storage. Easy set up!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: love this bed, hard to set up with just one person, tools arent the greatest i would use my own next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as needed. Delivery was ahead of schedule was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The was easy to assemble but did not match up with the headboard I had.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bed for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this so when I move out of my mother’s place she can use it for guests when they come over. It’s a nice color. Good for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel flores

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months it hold up but squeaks after a few
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed for my son's room. Something simple with plenty of storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Kateriena

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but stylish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and just what I was looking for. Missing one set of nut/bolt, but it came with one extra!
customer_reviews.author: Carey A.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than frame and boxspring.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and allows for under bed storage. Don't miss the frame and box spring!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuy

customer_reviews.title: Simple, fun, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, adds a pop of color, great price for great function!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Fair product
customer_reviews.text: Harder than imagined to put together but it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: schneiderka

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and very sturdy! Got the yellow cause it was cheaper but the color didn't matter after because the bedding covered everything!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry V.

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup (my teenage daughter did it on her ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, delivery was very prompt, easy to setup (my teenage daughter did it on her own at college!) and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: R Scott Kinkel

customer_reviews.title: Great! But you need two!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! But you it is much easier to put together with two people. Also, a rachet will definitely come in handy
customer_reviews.author: Irina Seale

product_meta.title: Modway Horizon Queen Bed Frame In Yellow - Replaces Box Spring - Folding Metal Mattress Bed Frame
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:YellowSleep better with the Horizon Metal Bed Frame. Horizon is made with a reinforced stainless steel metal base for long-term comfort and use with a generous 14 inches of space underneath to store hobby collections or seasonable clothing bins. Horizon comfortably supports up to 1300 lbs, easily folds away when not in use, and eliminates the need for a box spring with its heavy duty platform frame construction. Complete with non-marking foot caps to keep your carpets and floor safe, Horizon is a low profile modern bed frame that supports the standard mattress types on the market: memory foam, spring, latex or hybrids. Available in twin, full, or queen, Horizon reduces annoying squeaks and unpleasant bending or buckling, while transforming your home decor with a selection of stylish color options. Designed to provide lasting support for years to come, Horizon prevents saggy mattresses, and increases the mattress lifespan while delivering a better-made bed frame solution for your home. Mattress not included. Set Includes: One - Horizon Queen Bed Frame Product Dimensions: Overall Product Dimensions: 60"L x 80"W x 14"H
feature_bullets: MODERN BED FRAME - Horizon bed frames are available in a variety of vivid colors to energize your master, guest or kid room with a low profile contemporary look.
EXTRA STRONG - These heavy duty stainless steel metal frames comes with a middle leg support for added stability. Holds up to 1300 lbs without bending or buckling and helps prevent saggy mattresses.
NO BOX SPRING - Horizon eliminates the need for a box spring while ensuring a sturdy mattress with a versatile platform bed base that supports mattress types such as innerspring and memory foam.
FOLDABLE BED - Horizon easily folds away when not in use. This is a low profile solution that can easily store and be used anywhere in the house.
SPACIOUS STORAGE - Complete with 14 inches of generous storage space underneath, keep your hobby collections or seasonal clothing bins close with extra bedroom storage space.
